trans-unit.source: Represents a service that can return information items about ambient properties or ambient types to type converters and markup extensions.
This interface represents the service that can help type converters and markup extensions to get the ambient property identifiers for the XAML type system (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> objects).
trans-unit.target: 此接口表示服务类型转换器和标记扩展的环境属性标识符获取 XAML 类型系统可帮助 (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>对象)。

trans-unit.source: The service can also get the ambient property values from classes.
trans-unit.target: 服务还可以从类获取环境的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Types can also be ambient; any member that uses that type as its value should be considered ambient.
trans-unit.target: 类型也可以是环境;使用该类型作为其值的任何成员应视为环境。

trans-unit.source: This service is typically returned through a call to <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A>, which is made against a context-specific service provider.
trans-unit.target: 此服务通常通过调用返回<xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A>，针对特定于上下文的服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The service provider is generally available to contexts that need it, such as the execution code of a value converter.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供程序是普遍适用于需要它，如值转换器执行代码的上下文。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型转换器和 XAML 的标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)和[可供类型转换器和标记扩展的上下文服务](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。

trans-unit.source: About Ambient Properties
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a property whose property value should be available to type converter and markup extension usages that exist in the XAML node structure and in the object graph created from it.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是其属性值应为可供类型转换器和存在的标记扩展用法，XAML 节点结构中和从其创建的对象图中的属性。

trans-unit.source: This is relevant for a XAML processor during the object-writing phase of the load path or the serialization phase of a save path.
trans-unit.target: 这是适用于 XAML 处理器在加载路径的对象编写阶段或保存的序列化阶段期间路径。

trans-unit.source: In the load path case, the ambient property value might influence the value in the object graph of other properties that exist underneath it in a XAML node structure.
trans-unit.target: 在加载路径的情况下，环境属性值可能会影响在 XAML 节点结构中其下存在其他属性的对象图中的值。

trans-unit.source: When processed as a XAML node stream, the ambient concept means the ambient property value must be available to type converters and markup extensions from `StartObject` to `EndObject`.
trans-unit.target: 当处理为 XAML 节点流，环境概念意味着环境属性值必须是可供类型转换器和标记扩展`StartObject`到`EndObject`。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, a type converter that is used for the save path can use knowledge of the ambient property and its value.
trans-unit.target: 同样，使用的类型转换器于保存路径可以使用环境的属性和其值的知识。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the XAML that is produced is a better round-trip representation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，生成的 XAML 是更好的往返过程表示形式。

trans-unit.source: For members in general, XAML does not specify the order in which members of an object must be processed.
trans-unit.target: 成员一般情况下，XAML 未指定对象的成员必须处理的顺序。

trans-unit.source: However, any ambient property value must be processed first by the XAML reader so that the type converter and markup extension usages that are contained in other properties can access it through the <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider> service.
trans-unit.target: 但是，任何环境属性值都必须先通过 XAML 读取器处理，以便其他属性中包含的类型转换器和标记扩展用法可以访问它通过<xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider>服务。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A> is a similar concept that also influences XAML node-processing order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A> 是一个类似的概念，也会影响 XAML 节点处理顺序。

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A> can only be used for peer member and node relationships; it cannot influence all descendants.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A>仅用于对等成员和节点关系; 它不能影响所有后代。

trans-unit.source: Also, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A> directly influences object graph property setting; whereas the ambient technique relies on type converters or markup extensions.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A>直接影响对象关系图属性设置; 而环境技术依赖于类型转换器或标记扩展。

trans-unit.source: In the ambient technique, there must also be a specific type converter or markup extension definition that specifies how the ambient property value should be interpreted and applied to the object.
trans-unit.target: 在环境的技术中，还必须特定的类型转换器或标记扩展定义，以指定应如何解释并应用于对象的环境属性值。

trans-unit.source: WPF Usage Notes
trans-unit.target: WPF 用法说明

trans-unit.source: An ambient property scenario that is illustrated in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] feature set is <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which can qualify the necessary property name lookups for other values.
trans-unit.target: 如下所示的环境属性方案[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]功能集<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，这可以限定必要的属性名称查找有关其他值。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value qualifies the <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values that are located in the XAML nodes underneath it.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值限定<xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>位于其下的 XAML 节点的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> uses the type converter behavior for a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 使用的类型转换器行为<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior accesses the ambient <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value by querying <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetFirstAmbientValue%2A> from a service context that is available to type converters and markup extensions.
trans-unit.target: 此行为活动访问环境<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值通过查询<xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetFirstAmbientValue%2A>程序是可供类型转换器和标记扩展的服务上下文中。

trans-unit.source: An ambient type scenario that is illustrated in the WPF feature set is <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 如下所示的 WPF 功能集的环境类型方案是<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> has a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A> property that can contain other <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> objects to merge, and the intended order of resource resolution for the merged scenario clashes with the order that types are loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> 具有<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>属性，它可以包含其他<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>对象，若要合并和预期的资源解析顺序合并的方案不冲突的使用类型的加载顺序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> applies <xref:System.Windows.Markup.AmbientAttribute> so that a XAML processor can correctly process the references in a merged dictionary with `StaticResource` usages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> 适用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.AmbientAttribute>以便 XAML 处理器可以正确处理的合并字典中的引用`StaticResource`用法。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, `StaticResource` is a markup extension, which calls <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，`StaticResource`是标记扩展，后者将调用<xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable set of ambient type or property information items for the requested scope.
The set of types from which to retrieve ambient type information.
Returns an enumerable set of object instances of possible ambient types for the requested types.
An enumerable set of objects that represent the values for the requested set of <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> identifiers.
Specifies one or more types that should stop the evaluation when they are encountered traversing upward in the object graph.
This type holds the desired ambient property.
May be <see langword="null" />.
Specifies one or more property identifier objects that identify the properties to be considered ambient.
Returns an enumerable set of ambient property information items for the requested set of properties.
An enumerable set of ambient property information items for the requested set of properties.
The property information for each <see cref="T:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue" /> that is returned will match one of the input <paramref name="properties" />.
Each <xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue> that is returned contains the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> identifier and a property value.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue>返回包含<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>标识符和属性值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one or more types that should stop the evaluation when they are encountered traversing upward in the object graph.
This type holds the desired ambient property.
May be <see langword="null" />.
<see langword="true" /> to not use a saved context; <see langword="false" /> to use a saved context.
The default is <see langword="false" />.
Specifies one or more property identifier objects that identify the properties to be considered ambient.
Returns an enumerable set of ambient property information items for the requested set of types and properties.
An enumerable set of ambient property information items for the requested set of types and properties.
The property information for each <see cref="T:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue" /> that is returned will match one of the input <paramref name="types" /> or <paramref name="properties" />.
Each <xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue> that is returned contains the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> identifier and a property value.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue>返回包含<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>标识符和属性值。

trans-unit.source: This particular <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%2A> overload can search for ambient types and ambient properties in the same pass through a tree.
trans-unit.target: 此特定<xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%2A>重载可以搜索环境类型，然后在同一个环境属性通过树。

trans-unit.source: Using this overload results in an ordering of items in the return value that is different from <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Xaml.XamlType%7D%2CSystem.Xaml.XamlMember%5B%5D%29> or <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%28System.Xaml.XamlType%5B%5D%29>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载将导致在从不同的返回值中的项排序<xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Xaml.XamlType%7D%2CSystem.Xaml.XamlMember%5B%5D%29>或<xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%28System.Xaml.XamlType%5B%5D%29>。

trans-unit.source: This overload also permits the search to not use any saved context.
trans-unit.target: 此重载还允许在不使用任何已保存的上下文的搜索。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Xaml.XamlType%7D%2CSystem.Xaml.XamlMember%5B%5D%29> or <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%28System.Xaml.XamlType%5B%5D%29> overloads implicitly use a saved context if it is available (they always act as if an implicit `searchLiveStackOnly` parameter is `false`).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Xaml.XamlType%7D%2CSystem.Xaml.XamlMember%5B%5D%29>或<xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetAllAmbientValues%28System.Xaml.XamlType%5B%5D%29>是否可用重载都隐式使用已保存的上下文 (它们始终作用就像一种隐式`searchLiveStackOnly`参数是`false`)。

trans-unit.source: The concept of a saved context is potentially handled differently by particular XAML schema contexts, or by frameworks that incorporate XAML.
trans-unit.target: 已保存的上下文的概念处理可能以不同的方式，通过特定的 XAML 架构上下文，或由包含 XAML 的框架。

trans-unit.source: In the WPF XAML implementation, saved contexts are used for template expansion, as well as other feature areas.
trans-unit.target: 在 WPF XAML 实现中，保存的上下文用于模板扩展以及其他功能区域。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single ambient type or property information item from the requested set, based on which property is first encountered.
The set of types from which to retrieve ambient type information.
Returns the first matching object that is a possible ambient type for the requested types.
The first result object for the requested set.
Specifies one or more types that should stop the evaluation when they are encountered traversing upward in the object graph.
This type holds the desired ambient property.
Specifies one or more objects that identify the properties to be considered ambient.
Returns a single ambient property information item from the requested set of properties, based on which property is first encountered.
A single ambient property information item for the first ambient property value from the <paramref name="properties" /> list that is found.
Each <xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue> that is returned contains the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> identifier and a property value.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue>返回包含<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>标识符和属性值。
